comment.author: 24164195@N03
comment._content: I've suggested a location for this photo over at the Suggestify project. I think it was taken somewhere around: West Brighton, New York, NY, US, United States. You can see the exact location and approve or reject this suggestion by following this link: suggestify.appspot.com/review/5832928767 If you do approve the suggestion then your photo will be automagically geotagged! (You can also configure Suggestify to stop these notifications from being added to your photos or to prevent any of your photos from being "suggestified" at all in the future.)
